Summary._: Southbound [2] and [5] trains service changes and delays because of a train with mechanical problems at 3 Av-149 St.

Description._:
Southbound [5] trains are running local from E 180 St to 3 Av-149 St.

Expect delays on [2] and [5] trains in both directions.

These service changes are because of an earlier incident involving a train with mechanical problems at 3 Av-149 St.

Summary._: Southbound [4] trains are running express from 149 St-Grand Concourse to 125 St because of a sick passenger at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Summary._: Northbound [E] trains are running local from 75 Av to Briarwood-Van Wyck because of signal problems at Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.

Description._:
Northbound [E] trains are running local from 75 Av to Briarwood-Van Wyck because of signal problems at Kew Gardens-Union Tpke.

Expect delays on [E] and [F] trains.
